scripts.build: npm run gen && shx mkdir -p public && shx rm -rf public/* && shx cp -R static/. public/ && elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=./public/dist/main.js
scripts.dev: shx mkdir -p live && shx rm -rf live/* && shx cp -R static/. live/ && elm-live src/Main.elm --dir=live --start-page=index.html -- --debug --output=live/dist/main.js
